title: The Tony Romo Spectacular!
itunes:title: The Tony Romo Spectacular!
description:
A room filled with heroes – Dan Hanzus, Marc Sessler, Chris Wesseling, & Gregg Rosenthal – break down the winners and losers of Tony Romo’s retirement – what does it mean for the Texans, and how will it affect Romo’s legacy? Plus the heroes discuss Marshawn Lynch’s decision to come out of retirement, and whether or not he could be the missing piece for the Raiders offense.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
